reviews.review: Class always offline, sports complex mai hoti hai, jitna upper btaya bss uthna padhna hota hai, marks- ek 2 min ki drill, attendence, ek assignment, ek end term ka paper ke basis pr milte hai, jo aayga usko marks milenge qki yha attendance matter krti hai qki NCC ka aim sbme quality develop krna hai, baaki sbhi FECs ki trah bss marks baatna nhi, u are blessed if u choose this FEC, *physical punishments are always there if you committed a mistake (Ragda apni language mai) no stress at all, qki sb class Mai btaya jaata hai aur jyada likha bhi nhi hota paper mai, bss army personnels jihone medals kmaaye hai uhnke baare mai pta hona chiye, aur kiske baare mai padhna hai vo bhi yeh log khud btate hai, copy pen kbhi use nhi aayga NCC FEC mai, bss suno kro aur sheekho, no writing required. Mje bhot aate hai if u are eager to go through a disciplined life of Army ( a small reflection of Army)
reviews.study_time: Only class timings i.e 4 hours of week are enough and if u are eager to know more, always welcome, mid Sem nhi hota hai, end sem mai PVCs Army and NCC ke baare mai likhna hota hai, and DRILL krke dikhaani hoti hai, agar hamesha present rhoge, chijo ko bdia se kroge toh seniors bdia grade de denge aaram se, bss vo tumhe jaante ho aur tumne classes li ho

reviews.review:
Only Offline classes are conducted, mam doesn't take online lectures, but the frequency of these classes is quite low. As a result, there is no significant burden on the students regarding attendance.
 The exam paper is often repeated, and answer sheets with maximum marks are readily available, so it only takes a maximum of two hours to complete the syllabus.
 In my personal experience, I scored an O in this subject. In fact, no student scored below an A, the general trend was an A+ and more than 12 students scoring an O in just my class alone. There was also another batch of students with similar results.
 
 The exam didn't cause any undue stress, as everyone was aware that the paper would be repeated. In fact, even with minimal preparation, one could still score well. Last day is more than enough or even if you start studying at 5 in the morning like me you'll end up with a 45. It is important to keep in mind that vocabulary and neatness of the answer sheet plays a crucial role in determining one's score, as the syllabus emphasizes on general moral values, so the only differentiating factor was vocab and neatness, this was told by the teacher in the class.
reviews.study_time: 2-3 Hours

reviews.review:
Syllabus was very easy and based more on our own experiences, even if you have'nt studied for a minute for exam then also you could manage a presentable score by thinking on the spot. Marks mil jaate hai agar thode bhi relevant points likh ke aate ho toh, not just for this but true for all FECs.
 
 Exams se phele stress nahi hota hai, believe me on this. Class me no one is forced to study, but agr kar loge toh exam time me bas 30 min ki padhai se kaam banjayega 
 
 All in all, especially for the students who will have BME in their semester, I recommend this to lower your mugging up burden.

reviews.review: Classes are all offline. I studied one day before exam, but I had attended all classes and had complete notes so it was not a problem. Papers are not difficult if again, you attended classes and have complete notes. Not very difficult to score high marks, and not that much stress before exam. Yes, unless you already know German (which I didn't), you will have to properly study in class. The day before the exam will be spent reading notes you made throughout the semester, and that is sufficient to score very good. You cannot start from scratch during exam days.
reviews.study_time: One day before exam is sufficient ONLY IF you attended classes and have proper notes

reviews.review: Classes both offline and online. I knew German, so didn't have to study much. Paper is mostly fill in the blanks with options given. reviews.review: In classes not much regarding course was taught initially. Later few drawing exercises were introduced. But in the last week before endsem we were given a lot of sheets to make, which took a lot of time. For that I'll say make them before hand. Ask ur DOD friends or seniors for what is to be done in those sheets, they are simple to make but a lot of time and effort goes into them. For exams not much is to be done. Research on few artists on which class discussion takes place mostly their art and lifestyle is enough(actually the only syllabus for theory part). In midsem we got 1 drawing question which had a lot of shading skills required. In endsem we got 4 drawing questions which were ez, however in order to attempt full paper the thoery part was to be completed quickly as their was a lot to write.
reviews.study_time: As usual just a little net surfing a night before the exam will do for the theory part, however the drawing portion of the paper requires understanding of few basic techniques and terms which only those who are interested in drawing would put effort in learning.

 Marks kese milte hai ye nhi pta ( hame mid sem ke marks nhi bataye ) , baki fec chill hai bas drawing ke assignment bhot milte hai (mostly bacche nhi karte ek bhi assignment)

reviews.review:
In one sentence- bhul ke bhi matt lena. I know 'Engineering Exploration' sounds thrilling (yahi galti ki thi :v ) but don't go by the name. There's much better, easier and exciting electives for you to go for.
 Classes twice a week, tons of practicals, theory exams, projects, viva - this FEC has it all. Felt more burdened by this elective compared to the core subjects. Plus we had no mass bunks. There's viva for practicals as well as final project. The theory exam tho doesn't require a lot of preparation, a day or two is more than enough, though that's the case for even the toughest of electives. Nevertheless, buckle up if end up choosing this FEC!
reviews.study_time: A day or two at max.

Ek raat phele 2-3 ghante ppts se pdne se kaam bn jaega (jo ppt tum khud bnaoge whi ppt se ques ppr aata h). Class me padhai ekdum na ke barabar. Aaram se class me aake lab prac krke apna kaam kr skte ho. Bs prof se sahi se bna ke rkhni h baaki cws ke marks aaram se mil jaenge.
reviews.study_time: 2-3 ghante kaafi h

reviews.review: Offline classes. Attend for the last 15mins in every class(that's the time of attendance) and there you have one week's attendance done! Easyy
reviews.study_time: 1hour max, whole paper comes from a pdf which he shares 2days before.

reviews.review: Bhai marks bilkul nahi deta. Midsems chal rahe tha and isna assignment de dia tha last day padhloge tho hojayega. Attendance ka bhi bht issue hai.
reviews.study_time: Ek raat pehle padhlo ho jayega but teacher marks nahi deta.

reviews.review: The class will be held according to his mood.Ek raat phle pdhoge to hojyga par wo marks nhii dega blkul bhi bhot kam marks milte h har kisii k khii na khii to kaat hi lega har question ma.Stress to nhii hoga 5 handout milte h wo krna hota h but dusre slot wala teacher bhot chill h wo sara important btadega ki yha yha sa krna h class ma pnge leta rhega beech beech ma uthake puchta rhega but late aane pa kuch nhii khta blkul
reviews.study_time: Ek raat ma ho jyga tables wagara ache sa banana tb jaake thode kam marks kaatega

reviews.review:
Classes were held offline (ofc)
 I only studied for 2-3 hourse before mid sem and end sem
 Marks tabhi milenge jab ye FEC samajh me aayegi, free ke marks nahi milte isme.
 Marks ke liye classes regularly attend karni padti hai aur class me dhyan lagana padta hai, agar exam se ek din pahle padhoge to marks nahi ayenge.
 Only choose this FEC if you are really really interested in this subject.
reviews.study_time: If you want to score good in this FEC then you'll have to regularly attend classes, kyonki notes se to kuchh samajh nahi aane wala.

reviews.review: I would like to have some online classes
reviews.study_time: 5 hours

reviews.review: Only offline classes. I will advice you to only take it if you have prior exposure to the subject. If the answer is wrong there will be no marks awarded by any means. Alot of people got 0 in midsems. Agar pehle kabhi nahi padha japanese toh regularly roz class ka revise karoge tabhi hoga, warna 100% fail hoge.
reviews.study_time: Agar pehle se nahi padha toh not possible to even pass the exam

reviews.review: Classes offline hui thi and subh uthke ane me dikkt hoti he. Har FEC wale din thorasa padna parega coz language sub he. Marks mil jayenge coz ek classtest hote jiske marks end sems me zurte he and classtest he toh cheating bhi hojayega. And class me padne ki jarurat nhi he coz sbkuch tumhe hi krna padega.
reviews.study_time: Har FEC wale din padna parega tki kuch smj aye.

reviews.review: The classes were very productive and interesting. We also got to know about the Japanese culture and tradtions through our teacher
